item.description:
Get together to talk about Boston sailing opportunities and networking for the Boston Sailing Meetup group. *** THIS is a Joint Meetup with MassBaySailors and Mass Boating Crew Finder. OVER 100 ppl are already on the RSVP lists. ***

Here's your chance to network with people and talk about sailing in Boston. Use this time to find out about the different sailing options, and clubs around Boston Harbor.

Come have a drink with a great group of fellow Boston Sailing Enthusiasts! Meet at Boston Sail Loft Bar in the North End (80 Atlantic Ave) at 7:30pm. Talk about your sailing options for the summer.

ps. The last monthly event was well attended with folks from Boston Sailing Center, Piers Park, Community Boating, and a romored Captain of the Costa Concordia ;) Boston Sail Loft is on the Waterfront a great place to get ye' Grog 'n Grub.

Anyone with connections to the local clubs or sailing groups in Boston, please have a representative contact Todd if they wish to "present" their option to the group.

This is a regular 3rd Wednesday of the Month event.

  • BLUE name badges are boat owners, captains, and club members.
  • RED name badges are crew and all others.
  • GREEN name badges are Marine Services Industry (representing a commercial interest wth prior registration required, contact todd@hestiacruises.com or 617-510-6767 - for commercial interests only.)

Sponsor:

RIB Adventure Tours is offering 75min RIB tours at a discount to those that RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: We have the front room reserved with a few free snacks
item.name: Boston Sailing Monthly Meetup
